languages.text: {n}Бледное лицо Кибеллы каменеет, в глазах застывает суровая жесткость.{/n} "Ибо в этом воля Его. Ибо в этом мой долг. Я... помню".
{n}Kibellah's face turns to stone, and her eyes harden with grim resolve.{/n} "For such is His will. And such is my duty. I remember."
languages.original_text: {n}Бледное лицо Кибеллы каменеет, в глазах застывает суровая жесткость.{/n} "Ибо в этом воля Его. Ибо в этом мой долг. Я... помню".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah freezes, her eyes hardening with grim resolve.{/n} "For such is His will. And such is my duty. I remember."

{n}Kibellah's face turns to stone, and her eyes harden with grim resolve.{/n} "For such is His will. And such is my duty. I remember."

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Kibellah se petrifica y su mirada se endurece con una sombría determinación.{/n} «Pues esa es Su voluntad. Y ese es mi deber. Lo recuerdo».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's face turns to stone, and her eyes harden with grim resolve.{/n} "For such is His will. And such is my duty. I remember."

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Kibellah se petrifica y su mirada se endurece con una sombría determinación.{/n} «Pues esa es Su voluntad. Y ese es mi deber. Lo recuerdo».

languages.text: {n}キベラの顔が石のように固くなり、その目は険しい決意で固められる。{/n}「それが主の意思よ。そしてそれが私の使命。覚えているわ」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's face turns to stone, and her eyes harden with grim resolve.{/n} "For such is His will. And such is my duty. I remember."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラの顔が石のように固くなり、その目は険しい決意で固められる。{/n}「それが主の意思よ。そしてそれが私の使命。覚えているわ」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈的脸变得毫无表情，目光冷硬，充满了严峻的决心。{/n}“因为这是祂的旨意，因为这是我的职责。我没有忘记。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's face turns to stone, and her eyes harden with grim resolve.{/n} "For such is His will. And such is my duty. I remember."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈的脸变得毫无表情，目光冷硬，充满了严峻的决心。{/n}“因为这是祂的旨意，因为这是我的职责。我没有忘记。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellahs Miene versteinert, und ihr Blick verhärtet sich mit grimmiger Entschlossenheit.{/n} "Denn so lautet Sein Wille. Und so lautet meine Pflicht. Ich erinnere mich."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's face turns to stone, and her eyes harden with grim resolve.{/n} "For such is His will. And such is my duty. I remember."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellahs Miene versteinert, und ihr Blick verhärtet sich mit grimmiger Entschlossenheit.{/n} "Denn so lautet Sein Wille. Und so lautet meine Pflicht. Ich erinnere mich."

languages.text: {n}Le visage de Kibellah se fige et ses yeux se durcissent à la flamme d'une funeste détermination.{/n} « Car telle est Sa volonté. Et tel est mon devoir. Non, je n'ai pas oublié. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's face turns to stone, and her eyes harden with grim resolve.{/n} "For such is His will. And such is my duty. I remember."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage de Kibellah se fige et ses yeux se durcissent à la flamme d'une funeste détermination.{/n} « Car telle est Sa volonté. Et tel est mon devoir. Non, je n'ai pas oublié. »

languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's face turns to stone, and her eyes harden with grim resolve.{/n} "For such is His will. And such is my duty. I remember."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah'nın yüzü taş kesilirken gözleri de kati bir kararlılıkla doluyor.{/n} "O'nun arzusu bu şekildedir. Benim vazifem de budur. Hatırlıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's face turns to stone, and her eyes harden with grim resolve.{/n} "For such is His will. And such is my duty. I remember."
